description.english: If the plan fails, convince others that it’s their loss
description.german: Wenn der Plan gescheitert ist, überzeuge die anderen, dass es ihr Verlust ist
description.french: Si le plan a échoué, fais croire aux autres que c'est leur perte
description.italian: Se il piano è fallito, convincili che è una loro perdita
description.koreana: 계획이 실패했다면, 다른 사람들에게 그것이 그들의 손실이라고 확신시켜라
description.spanish: Si el plan falla, convence a los demás de que ellos pierden
description.schinese: 如果计划失败了，确保让其他人相信这是他们的损失。
description.tchinese: 如果計劃失敗了，就說服其他人這是他們的損失
description.russian: Если план оказался неудачен, убеди других, что это их потеря
description.japanese: 計画が失敗した場合は、他の人にそれが彼らの損失だと納得させろ。
description.polish: Jeśli plan się nie powiódł, przekonaj innych, że to ich strata
description.turkish: Eğer plan başarısız olduysa, başkalarını bunun onların kaybı olduğuna ikna et
description.brazilian: Se o plano falhou, convença os outros de que essa é a perda deles

description.english: Being there for each other when you're all in a vulnerable position brings you closer
description.german: In der Nähe zu sein, wenn man sich in einer verletzlichen Lage befindet, schafft Nähe
description.french: Être là quand vous êtes tous dans une position vulnérable rapproche
description.italian: Essere vicini quando tutti sono in una posizione vulnerabile avvicina
description.koreana: 취약한 상황에 있을 때 곁에 있는 것은 가까워지게 한다
description.spanish: Estar ahí cuando todas están en una posición vulnerable las acerca más
description.schinese: 在你们都处于脆弱状态时，靠近彼此会让人更亲近。
description.tchinese: 在你們都處於脆弱狀態時，出現在身邊會讓人更親近
description.russian: Оказаться рядом, когда вы все в уязвимом положении, сближает
description.japanese: 近くにいることは、皆が弱い立場にあるときに親密さを深める。
description.polish: Bycie blisko, gdy wszyscy jesteście w wrażliwej sytuacji, zbliża
description.turkish: Yanında olmak, herkesin savunmasız olduğu anlarda insanları yakınlaştırır
description.brazilian: Estar ao lado quando vocês estão todos em uma posição vulnerável aproxima

description.english: Watch where you step
description.german: Schau, wo du hintrittst
description.french: Regarde où tu mets les pieds
description.italian: Guarda dove metti i piedi
description.spanish: Mira dónde pisas
description.schinese: 看你踩在哪里
description.tchinese: 看你踩到哪裡
description.japanese: 足元に注意。
description.brazilian: Olha onde você pisa

description.english: Spiders are more pleasant in this form
description.german: In dieser Form sind Spinnen angenehmer
description.french: Dans cette forme, les araignées sont plus agréables
description.italian: In questo modo i ragni sono più piacevoli
description.spanish: Las arañas se ven más bonitas de esta manera
description.schinese: 这种形态的蜘蛛更让人愉悦。
description.tchinese: 這樣的蜘蛛看起來更可愛
description.japanese: その形のままだと、クモはより魅力的。
description.polish: W takiej formie pająki są przyjemniejsze
description.brazilian: Nesse formato, as aranhas são mais agradáveis

description.english: There were no explanations from the very beginning

description.polish: Nie było żadnych wyjaśnień od samego początku
description.brazilian: Não houve explicações desde o começo

description.english: Curiosity didn't get this cat killed

description.french: Ce chat n'a pas été perdu à cause de sa curiosité
